named-query.name: SitRuoloTares.getListaRuoliByCF
named-query.query: select d from SitRuoloTares d where d.codfisc= :codfisc order by d.anno, d.tipo

named-query.name: SitRuoloTaresImm.getListaImmByCodRuolo
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTaresImm s where s.idExtRuolo= :idExtRuolo order by to_number(s.prog)

named-query.name: SitRuoloTaresRata.getListaRateByCodRuolo
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTaresRata s where s.idExtRuolo= :idExtRuolo order by to_number(s.prog)

named-query.name: SitRuoloTaresSt.getListaStByCodRuolo
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTaresSt s where s.idExtRuolo= :idExtRuolo order by to_number(s.prog)

named-query.name: SitRuoloTaresStSg.getListaSgraviByCodRuolo
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTaresStSg s where s.idExtRuolo= :idExtRuolo order by to_number(s.prog)

named-query.name: SitRuoloTarPdf.getListaPdfByCfCu
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTarPdf s where s.codfisc= :codfisc and s.cu=:cu order by s.anno, s.mese

named-query.name: SitRuoloTarPdf.getListaPdfByCf
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTarPdf s where s.codfisc= :codfisc order by s.anno, s.mese
